p: There were no differences detected between treatment groups in herding, reproduction, or agonism, but treatment group did influence harem-social behavior. Observed instances of harem-tending behavior provided too few data to model. Because these social behaviors were not as dependent on other broad categories as is the case with compositional time budgets [ 51], we re-estimated the social behavior models with only treatment and supported effects to allow for clearer interpretation of the results.
